content: the goldfinch snowflake is part of the snowfall crochet along 2023- a rainbow this pattern is available for free on my website here 1 or you can purchase the pdf ebook of all 12 snowflake patterns here 2 i thought it would be fun to design my snowflakes a little differently this year so i have designed them in color and to work in both thread and catona yarn in thread these snowflakes are between 2-3 inches 5 1 7 6 cm or in yarn they are 4-5 inches 5 1 7 6 cm i get a surprising number of requests for smaller snowflakes and i have wanted to make some heavier gauge snowflakes similar to some of the snowflakes i have from my great grandma the slightly smaller snowflake size felt like the perfect opportunity to make the chunkier snowflakes as they are still a reasonable size this pattern includes written instructions only and photo tutorial on stiffening snowflakes there are no charts please check out my other patterns in my ravelry store here 3 1 https //jessicawifall com/2023/11/24/goldfinch-warbler-snowflakes-snowfall-2023-cal-a-rainbow-day-3/ 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/snowfall-crochet-along-2023---a-rainbow 3 https //www ravelry com/stores/jessica-wifall-designs
